quotes.quote: The truth exonerates and it convicts. It disinfects and it galvanizes.
The truth has always been and will always be our shield against corruption, our shield against greed and despair.
The truth is our saving grace.
Declare war on one of our most dangerous enemies: cynicism.
These times are here to let us know that we need to take a stand for our right to have hope.
What are you willing to stand for?
Put your honor where your mouth is.
To somebody who's hurting, something is everything.
Don't ever confuse what is legal with what is moral.
Do the right thing, especially when nobody's looking.
Your job is not who you are—it's just what you're doing on the way to who you will become.
Become so skilled, so vigilant, so flat-out fantastic at what you do that your talent cannot be dismissed.
Stop comparing yourself to other people.
You're only on this planet to be you—not someone else's imitation of you.
Your life journey is about learning to become more of who you are and fulfilling the highest, truest expression of yourself as a human being.
Discernment is what we're missing—and a kind heart.
This degree is a privilege, and that privilege obligates you to use what you've learned to lend a hand to somebody who doesn't get to be here.
When the time comes to bet on yourself, I hope you double down.
